body.p:
You can use the New DITA Topic action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Content Generation category to ask the AI Positron to create a new DITA topic containing content expanded by the AI based on an initial idea expressed in plain text format.
The New DITA Topic prompt dialog allows attaching images, PDF, Word or PowerPoint documents. There are some sample documents in: .

dlentry.dt: Create a DITA XML topic from an attached document

p.codeblock: Create a valid DITA XML topic from the following content.

note.p: This action is not compatible with the WebAuthor in-browser editor.
